name: Project V
description:
V stands for Vampires..?

Meet Draco, a powerful Vampire who confines himself inside his gigantic silver casket. Despite the incredible power of his vessel, all he wants is to be left alone in the peace and comfort of his sofa.

Fortunately for you, a huge space fleet happens to stumble upon the coffin, and decides to attack immediately to save you from boredom. Taking the role of Draco's wing-man vampire cat, Murcia, you need to navigate and shoot your way through tight corridors of bullet hell coming at you at mach 3.

Sexy vampire features of the game include:
  • Control a Badass Silver Coffin that was designed for maximum damage and speed. Badass.
  • 4 stages! Yes, Jam games aren't supposed to be finished, but this game kinda is! Mostly!
  • A fairly wide variety of enemies and attack patterns, with the enemy sprites asset pack architected by Medimon Games: https://medimongames.itch.io/pixel-spaceships-hd
  • Decent scoring system, just like in those fancy arcade machines! Share your score to be added to a leaderboard!
  • A well thought plot with deep lore, and the writer definitely wasn't sleep deprived while writing most of it.
  • Full controller support! Full supporter control!
  • Over 5 insanely good themes composed by Robot Metal Nick: https://nicolassantana.bandcamp.com/ - seriously, how'd he make so many banger themes in just 10 days???
  • Gorgeously crazy Vampire waifu later on in the game that will make you SIMPly question your life choices. But you're no simp, right?
  • Oh and the guy who drew her also has a lot more cool stuff, check out this cactus girl: https://www.newgrounds.com/art/view/ricejunk/caitlin
  • A lot of bullets that make the point. Just download the game already!
Controls (keyboard/gamepad):

Main menu and start screen - Z to start, X to cancel.

Movement - arrow keys/d-pad/joystick (WASD if you're a weirdo)

Shoot Bullets - Hold Z/(A)

VAMPIRE LASER MODE - Press C/(X). Keep holding Z. Only usable with full energy bar, shown on the top left corner of the screen below HP.

Leaderboards:

  2. Rolling Crow - 1207370
  3. SmolDanny - 1111960

Post a screenshot of your score in the comments, social media, discord, or send it directly to us to be added to the leaderboards!

(Please note that due to a bug with in-game leaderboards, we can only add your score if you complete the game without continues)

日本プレイヤーへのノート:

私たちの日本語の理解度は低いのですが、皆さんのご意見をお聞かせください。日本語でお気軽にコメントをお寄せください！

操作方法：

Z(A) - シュート

C(X) - ヴァンパイアレーザーモード

コントローラー対応！
